Last Scene In Shadows

“Last Scene In Shadows” moves at 80 BPM, weaving a gritty lo-fi beat with analog warmth. Dusty drums lay the foundation while haunting pads and reverse piano echoes stretch into the mix, creating a moody, nostalgic atmosphere. Subtle textures drift like smoke through a slow NYC haze, balancing melancholy with quiet defiance. A chillhop instrumental that feels cinematic and raw — perfect for late-night city walks, solitary focus, or moments of introspection.

  • Album: Stranger Vibes
  • Genre: lo-fi hip hop, downtempo, chillhop
  • Mood:
  • Duration: 2:47
